helpPage.title: Help Center
helpPage.subtitle: Find answers to common questions and get the support you need for your Nuroo journey.
helpPage.faq1Answer: Nuroo is an AI-powered platform designed to support children with special needs through personalized exercises, NurooAi chat support, and real-time progress tracking. Our goal is to make therapy accessible and affordable for every family.
helpPage.faq2Answer: NurooAi is our AI-powered chat assistant that provides 24/7 support specifically designed for special needs care. It offers instant responses, personalized guidance, and is always available to help parents and caregivers.
helpPage.faq3Answer: Nuroo is launching in 2025 and will be available on both the App Store and Google Play. We're currently in development and working hard to bring you the best possible experience.
helpPage.faq4Answer: Yes, absolutely. We use enterprise-grade security with HIPAA-compliant encryption and privacy controls. Your child's data is protected with end-to-end encryption and we never share personal information without consent.
helpPage.faq5Question: What types of special needs does Nuroo support?
helpPage.faq5Answer: Nuroo is designed to support children with various special needs including autism, ADHD, learning disabilities, developmental delays, and other conditions. Our AI adapts to each child's unique needs and learning style.
helpPage.faq6Answer: We're committed to making Nuroo affordable and accessible. Pricing details will be announced closer to our launch. We're working to ensure that quality support doesn't come with a high price tag.
helpPage.faq7Question: Can I use Nuroo alongside traditional therapy?
helpPage.faq7Answer: Yes! Nuroo is designed to complement traditional therapy, not replace it. Our platform can be used alongside existing therapy sessions to provide additional support and practice opportunities at home.
helpPage.stillNeedHelpDesc: Can't find what you're looking for? We're here to help.
